Data.oldValue: p.Processed = 'Y' AND p.IsReconciled = 'N' AND p.DocStatus IN('CO','CL','RE','VO') AND p.PayAmt <> 0 AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM C_BankStatementLine l WHERE p.C_Payment_ID = l.C_Payment_ID AND l.StmtAmt <> 0)

PO.Data: p.Processed = 'Y' AND p.IsReconciled = 'N' AND p.DocStatus IN('CO','CL','RE','VO') AND p.PayAmt <> 0 AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM C_BankStatement bs INNER JOIN C_BankStatementLine l ON(l.C_BankStatement_ID = bs.C_BankStatement_ID) WHERE p.C_Payment_ID = l.C_Payment_ID AND l.StmtAmt <> 0 AND (bs.DocStatus IN('CO', 'CL') OR bs.Processed = 'N'))
